post.text: "No one in our lifetime has ever had as much experience and exposure to the presidency. And yes, she happens to be a woman." â€”First Lady Michelle Obama: IWillVote.com

comment.author: Charlotte
comment.text: President Obama's approval rating now stands at 55%, the highest mark of his second term. At the end of his last term Bush was at 22% and Donald Reagan was at 50%.

replies.author: Conrad
replies.text: You are too stupid for words. Did you read that in the National Enquirer or see it on Jerry Springer?

replies.author: Austin
replies.text: that was a CNN poll. LMAO .
